alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 7:36PM CDT until April 25 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Dumas, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Borger, Fritch, Sunray, Stinnett, Sanford, Pringle and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
